title: How are developing countries using technology to improve the quality of life? - Quora

response.answer_text: The same way that developed countries did over the course of a thousand years plus. Except they dont have to invent and discover all the science and technology. They just need to copy the best of what the developed countries already have. The only thing slowing them down is human greed that exists among some of their populace and a lack of vision and good will. That problem remains with all of us.

Solar panels and Led lights provide inxpensive lighting during the dark hours in the evenings making it possible to engage in activities otherwise difficult to do, such as simple things like homework or crafts that can be sold in a market
